benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.subtitle: My benefits
benefits.description: Discover the benefits of my service

aboutTheDesigner.title: Who's behind it?
aboutTheDesigner.description: This is Andrea, the designer behind Citrus Design. With over 8 years of experience, she transforms ideas into unique and memorable experiences.

items.title: The simpler, the better
items.description: I love breaking down complex problems and transforming them into simple, clear, and meaningful design with my analytical approach.

items.title: User-centered design
items.description: I dive deep into what people really need and how they behave to create intuitive, useful, and meaningful experiences.

items.title: Coherent design
items.description: I use consistent patterns and components so everything makes sense and the user experience is as fluid as possible.

items.title: Constant growth
items.description: I constantly explore new trends, tools, and approaches to keep my design fresh, relevant, and constantly evolving.

items.title: UX/UI certified
items.description: Backed by cutting-edge and continuous training.

items.title: Featured in Forbes
items.description: Recognized for my influence and innovation in the digital world.

items.title: Friends of Figma Leader
items.description: I drive the Figma community to revolutionize collaborative design.

items.title: ADPList Mentor
items.description: I inspire and guide the next generation of talents with passion and experience.

home.orangeMessage: Make the most of your time! With my unlimited subscription, forget about budgets and complications while giving your projects a refreshing touch.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What my clients say
testimonials.description: Discover why my clients trust me

items.text: Andrea is a professional designer with whom communication is easy and who quickly understands what the company is looking for, bringing new ideas and perspectives that are clearly enriching.
items.author: Joel Pascual

items.text: From the beginning we trusted Andrea and the result has been exceptional, with good reviews, especially regarding the experience that the client achieves throughout the platform.
items.author: Jagoba Ormaetxea

items.text: Besides being fast and efficient, Andrea quickly understands the few inputs that are offered and from there her creativity emerges to reach an optimal solution.
items.author: Nacho Kleinman

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: My process is simple and easy. Avoid meetings and make the most of your time

steps.title: My way of working
steps.secondaryText: From subscription to final delivery, the process has been designed to maximize efficiency. Technology handles the operational, while I focus on bringing creativity and personal attention to each project.

steps.title: Make a request
steps.description: Request your design through my portal

howItWorks.limeMessage: I use an innovative model where quality and speed are my priority. I am the creative force behind every project, without external designers.

howItWorks.orangeMessage: Make the most of your time! With my unlimited subscription, forget about budgets and complications while giving your projects a refreshing touch.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that best suits you. No contracts, no stress... You can cancel anytime. Forget about freelancers or hiring an in-house designer.

items.title: Cancel anytime
items.description: No commitments, you decide when to leave.

items.title: One week trial
items.description: If you're not satisfied in the first week, I'll refund your money.

items.title: Book a call if you have questions
items.description: Book a personal session to resolve your questions.

products.title: Pricing model
products.secondaryText: Choose from one of my monthly subscriptions. Start immediately without contract - pause and cancel anytime.

pricing.customPriceDescription: For companies that need significantly more powerful designs, I have what you need.

descriptions.Enterprise: For companies that need much more powerful designs, we have what you need.

infoBox.title: Still have questions?
infoBox.description: Contact me, I'll be happy to answer all your questions :)

items.title: How can I make design requests?
items.answer: Once you have subscribed to one of my subscriptions, there is a section called Requests in your profile where you can submit your requests. Remember that you can only have one active request until the current request is completed.

items.title: When will I receive the designs?
items.answer: It depends on the complexity of the request, but you'll usually receive the designs within 2-3 business days.

items.title: Can I change my plan later?
items.answer: Yes, you just need to unsubscribe, wait until the end of your current subscription, and then subscribe again to the plan of your choice.

items.title: How does billing work?
items.answer: On the first day of execution of the first subscription and in monthly renewal cycles, you can download the invoice in the Invoice tab of the private client area.

items.title: Is there a refund policy if I don't like the service?
items.answer: You can try one of my subscriptions for a week, and if you're not satisfied with the service, I'll refund your money.

contact.title: How can I help you?
contact.description: Choose how you prefer to contact me, and I'll answer all your questions, or if you prefer, book a 20-minute introduction call.

email.title: Send me an email
email.description: Have questions or need more information? Write to me, and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

chat.title: Chat with me
chat.description: Prefer something faster? Connect with me in the chat, and I'll resolve your questions immediately.

meeting.title: Book 1:1 call
meeting.description: Let's talk about your project. Book a personal session and find the best solution for your design.

waitlist.title: Join the waitlist
waitlist.description: I want to offer everyone the best service, so I don't take many subscriptions at once. Join my waitlist, and I'll notify you when a spot on my platform becomes available 🎉
waitlist.successDescription: You'll receive a confirmation email soon with your current position. When a spot becomes available, I'll notify you by email, and you'll have X days to complete your subscription. If you don't do it within this period, your spot will go to the next user.

company.title: Citrus Designer
company.description: I transform your ideas into extraordinary designs. Simple and effective design subscription service.
